Package net.minestom.server.event.player

Class PlayerLoginEvent

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.event.player.PlayerLoginEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Event, EntityEvent, PlayerEvent
public class PlayerLoginEvent extends Object implements PlayerEvent
Called at player login, used to define his spawn instance.

Be aware that the player is not yet in a world when the event is called, meaning that most player methods will not work. You can use PlayerSpawnEvent and PlayerSpawnEvent.isFirstSpawn() if needed.

WARNING: defining the spawning instance is MANDATORY.
